game.name: PAYDAY 2: Yakuza Character Pack
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 멀티플레이어, 협동, 온라인 협동, 다운로드 가능한 콘텐츠, Steam 도전 과제, 컨트롤러 완벽 지원, Steam 트레이딩 카드, 앱 내 구매, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Japan is a land of warriors...The Yakuza Character Pack is the 27th DLC for PAYDAY 2. It allows heisters to play as Japanese heister Jiro, the Yakuza of the PAYDAY gang. Other than Jiro himself, it includes the Yakuza perk deck, Jiro's mask, the Shinsakuto-Katana melee weapon and the Micro Uzi.
